title: Mesa Grill Steak Sauce
ingredients: - Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
directions: Whisk together the ketchup, horseradish, honey, mustard, maple syrup, Worcestershire, and ancho powder in a small bowl until combined, and season with salt and pepper. Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour to allow the flavors to meld. Bring to room temperature before serving. The sauce will keep for up to 2 days in the refrigerator stored in a tightly sealed container.
